description: Umunyamakuru Isheja Sandrine hamwe na Solange Ese wowe uba muri “club”? Ba “Ni Nyampinga” baba muri “club” i Musanze batubwiye ibyiza byabyo.
title: Nge n’urungano
content:
Wari uzi ko mu matsinda cyangwa “clubs”, abahahuhira bashobora gukora no kwerekana imideri? None se wajyaga utekereza ko kuba muri “club” bituma umuntu ashobora gusabana n’abandi? “Ni Nyampinga” twasuye “Land African Fashion Agency”, “club” y’abakobwa n’abahungu i Musanze. Ik’ibanze ikora kikaba ari ukwerekana imideri. 
 
 “Nta muntu utaberwa, iyo utaberewe n’ikanzu uberwa n’ikabutura cyangwa ijipo.” Ibyo ni ibyo twabwiwe na Waldah, umwe mu bagize “club Land African Fashion Agency” akaba ari umwe mu bigisha abandi uko bakimbagira berekana imideri. 
 
 Waldah afatanya na Ismael, ari na we muyobozi w’iri tsinda; bagahitamo imyambaro ibereye buri wese bitewe n’uko ateye. Banashushanya imideri itandukanye bakayishyira abatayeri bakayibadodera.
 
 Abagize iri tsinda ntiberekana imideri gusa. Ngo iyo bahuye barishimisha, ndetse ubu ngo babaye inshuti zikomeye.
